short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Follow the price of ApeCoin in real time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension fetches the current price of ApeCoin and displays it in real-time. It provides the flexibility to customize the display currency to USD, ETH, or EUR based on your preferred settings. Stay up-to-date with Apecoin's value effortlessly with this extension.

Features : 
- Update price in real time when you open the extension
- Display $APE/ETH, $APE/USD, $APE/EUR
- Display 24H variations
- Display ETH price
